abstract: Comcast wants to be a sort of Facebook of video sharing. If you love an episode of “Lost,” you will eventually be able to use a multi-platform connection technology and Comcast’s video-licensing agreements to share it with your friends.
snippet: Comcast wants to be a sort of Facebook of video sharing. If you love an episode of “Lost,” you will eventually be able to use a multi-platform connection technology and Comcast’s video-licensing agreements to share it with your friends.
lead_paragraph: Plaxo is best known for its fancy address-book software that automatically updates everyone on your contact list whenever you make a change.

headline.main: It’s Complaxtic: Comcast Buys Plaxo to Bolster Video Sharing
